attributes.action: find more funding for our ex-servicemen who have reached an age when they need help.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Norman Binnall 89 years old from Burnham-on-Sea has been told he must leave his care home because he does not meet the government criteria for funding. Norman was a P.O.W in Germany for over 3 years and lost a foot at Dunkirk. He is petrified about returning home on his home with very little care. Is this the way we should be treating the Heroes who gave us what we have today. Ex-sevicemen like Norman have given this country a lot, let us not ignore them in their time of need.
